77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors

The Residences at 1127 Flatbush Avenue sit conveniently at the intersection of two of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods?Prospect Lefferts Gardens and Ditmas Park. Life at 1127 Flatbush is a luxury you can afford.

Each apartment is s thoughtfully considered balance of space and light. Studio, one, and two bedroom layouts all apportioned with in-unit climate control, dishwashers, and stainless steel appliances. Many units also provide private outdoor space overlooking your neighborhood.
Lifestyle 1127 Flatbush provides an authentic Brooklyn experience, sitting at a cultural crossroads representative of its borough. A short distance from Brooklyn?s Prospect Park, the King?s Theater and Ditmas? Park?s restaurant, shopping and nightlife-fueled Cortelyou Road, residents at 1127 Flatbush will enjoy not having to go far from home to experience the best of Brooklyn.

details.description:
Reside in a beautifully renovated 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in the historic Crown Heights neighborhood, where old-school charm meets modern convenience. This gorgeous apartment features stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, abundant natural sunlight, and contemporary finishes. Enjoy central A/C and heat, outdoor spaces, and laundry facilities within the building.

details.description: Explore refined living in this 1 Bed / 1 Bath at 144 West St in Greenpoint, Brooklyn. This boutique residence is nestled along the vibrant East River Waterfront, offering spacious layouts and elegant interiors. With floor-to-ceiling windows and warm oakwood floors, the unit is filled with natural light and inviting design. The kitchen boasts custom ivory cabinetry, sleek white quartz countertops, and Bosch stainless steel appliances, while the in-unit washer and dryer add modern convenience. The bathroom is your private retreat with a deep soaking tub. This pet-friendly building is also conveniently close to the G train at Greenpoint Avenue, making your commute a breeze.

Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system

Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

details.description:
Act Fast! This fantastic 3-bedroom, 1-bathroom apartment, is located in Brooklyn?s vibrant Flatbush-East Flatbush neighborhood. Discover some of Brooklyn?s best architecture with a variety of home styles.
FREE LAUNDRY IN BUILDING!
You'll be surrounded by trendy cafes, grocery stores, and local restaurants. The area is well-connected with the 2 and 3 subway lines, numerous bus routes, and it's just a short walk to the beautiful Prospect Park. Enjoy a quick commute to Atlantic Terminal, offering endless transportation options.
Take a stroll to nearby Flatbush Ave, Rogers Ave, and Nostrand Ave, bustling with trendy new small businesses and more!
Contact our agent today to schedule your appointment!

amenities.other: Granite counter tops

details.description:
Available for immediate move-in!
Beautiful and spacious 1BR APT in Ozone Park. Brand new kitchen. True living room area. Large size bedroom. 3 total closets.
Located in a well maintained complex. The complex features super on-site, maintenance personnel, laundry in the complex and parking ($).
Conveniently located close to JFK international airport. Only a few blocks away from the A train.
Pets are allowed case by case. Heat, hot water and gas included.
Contact me with your move-in date, income/credit and if you have any pets for a showing today!

Spacious studio apt completely renovated just last year!
The apt features a new kitchen with granite countertops. The bathroom features beautiful porcelains tiles. The apt features 2 double size closets plus an additional shelving closet for towels and/or sheets. The living area is large enough to have a queen size bed, a coach, bedroom furniture and a table and not feel too crowded.
Located in a well maintained complex with manager on site, super on site, laundry and parking($).
Get all the benefits of living in a condo-like complex without having to pay a monthly maintenance fee!
Contact me at 347-938-8264 with your move-in date, income/credit and if you have any pets for a showing today!

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.

SUNNY 1.5br / 1.5 bath DUPLEX with PRIVATE outdoor patio! Showing immediately! New construction built into what used to be a school attached to a renovated 145yo church converted into apartments! Wow. This is a one of a kind of apartment.
Video link is on StreetEasy. If you can?t see the video link , let me know and I?ll send it to you. Photos and video of actual apartment.
1br and full bath plus living room and kitchen upstairs PLUS extra ?rec? room and 1/2 bath downstairs. This works great for one person or a couple who want a lot of space but definitely fits 2 friends who want to be in this booming location in a luxury building with outdoor space for a great price.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment
Building features: ButterflyMX intercom Laundry room Huge Roof deck Parking (based on availability) Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
NO BROKER FEE!! Just 1st and security to move in! Pets ok!
Contact us to set up a viewing right away!

Unique one of a kind 1br built into what used to be a 140yo church converted into luxury apartments!
There is an elevator to the roof deck but this apartment is in the renovated church section so is a 3rd floor walk up. Please see pics. I can send you a video when I get one.
Unit features: Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in both rooms. Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Spacious bedroom and living room Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet for the bedroom (see video from identical apartment 522 or text me and I?ll sent it to you)

Pets ok

Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C
